text: Innum, avarkalil um'maic cevimatuppavarkalum irukkinranar; anal avarkal um'mai vittu veliyeriyatum, evarkalukku (veta) nanam arulap perrato avarkalaip parttu"avar carru mun enna kurinar?" Enru (parikacamakak) ketkinranar; ittakaiyorin irutayankalin mitu allah muttiraiyittuvittan. Melum ivarkal, tankal mano iccaikalaiye pinparrukinranar
